capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Harry has some impressive talents. He's quite the quidditch player, isn't he? I mean, being able to chase down those Golden Snitches is no easy feat. capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to know that we have an accurate understanding of her identity now.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to respect the boundaries of others, even in the face of adversity.
